bool stop_requested() const noexcept;

Checks if the {{tt|stop_source}} object has a stop-state and that state has received a stop request.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
{{c|true}} if the {{tt|stop_token}} object has a stop-state and it has received a stop request, {{c|false}} otherwise.
